name: School Of International Relations and Strategic Studies (SIRSS)
description: The School of International Relations and Strategic Studies was set up in 1987 to encourage interdisciplinary approaches to advanced study and research in the field of international relations and strategic studies. The School provides a forum for intellectual exchanges among the members of the three Faculties of the University. Since its inception, the School has promoted collaboration among scholars in analyzing problems having multi-disciplinary dimensions; in facilitating lectures, seminars and workshops; in funding research on issues of international concern.
